lash out.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to suddenly speak angrily to someone or criticize someone angrily
lash out.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Olson lashed out at the media.
lash out.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to try to hit someone with a series of violent uncontrolled movements
lash out.translation[0].definitions[1].e: She would suddenly lash out at other children.
